entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as still alive and in need of help. He is referred to as 'him'.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as suggesting that they should fly to help Sirius.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being irritated and discussing the plan to help Sirius.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as having a broomstick that isn't being guarded by a security troll.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as having a broomstick and wanting to help Sirius.

relationships.description: Harry is planning to help Sirius.
Luna is suggesting that they should fly to help Sirius.
Ron is planning to help Sirius.
Harry is disagreeing with Luna's suggestion.
Ron is excluding Ginny from the plan to help Sirius.
